items.title: Breakpoints
items.desc: Craft an adaptive user interface with Responsive utility variants for different screen sizes.

items.title: Variants
items.desc: Add CSS Pseudo-Class to utilities to style an element to create interactive behavior.

items.title: Dark/Light
items.desc: Sets dark or light theme to an element adaptively to browser default theme.

items.title: Palette
items.desc: Sets color to utilities such as Text, Background, Border, and more. Up to 5 color shades, tones and tints options.

items.title: Gradient
items.desc: Create background gradient colors with flexible control over color space, and angles.

items.title: Gradient Presets
items.desc: Create background gradient color with over 150+ presets to choose from.

items.title: Animations
items.desc: Animation control with delays, Duration, and Looping with Fade, Roll, Slide, and Blur utilities.

items.title: Orientation
items.desc: Sets screen orientation with other utilities to rotate in portrait or landscape mode.

items.title: Fluids
items.desc: Sets Text, Margin, and Padding utilities with consistent and fluid values without the breakpoints.

items.title: Plugin API
items.desc: Create new or modify existing utility on the go!
